juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Cream-colored tufted headboard
*   Multiple decorative pillows on the bed
*   Patterned bedspread
*   Dark, studded left nightstand
*   Table lamp on the left nightstand
*   Partially visible dark, studded right nightstand
*   Partially visible table lamp on the right nightstand
*   Light-colored tufted bench at the foot of the bed
*   Beige wall behind the bed
*   Window with sheer curtains on the left side of the room
*   Light-colored carpet
*   A landscape painting on the wall above the bed pillows
